full_summary:
**Business Analyst Positions RFP**
====================================================

**Reference:** PW-22-01012055

**Announcement Date:** November 1, 2022

**Closing Date:** November 24, 2022 at 13:00:00

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking a Business Analyst resource to provide assistance with business analysis requirements and process redesign for various internal and external processes across the agency.

This procurement is set-aside for Indigenous suppliers in accordance with the Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Only suppliers who meet the definition of an Indigenous business, as per the PSIB, may submit a Statement of Capabilities.

Tenders are being issued to holders of the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat’s Services and Processes (SP) Supplies Arrangement (TBIPS) under Tier 1 in the National Capital Region, specifically for the following categories:

* 1 Level 3 Business Analyst
* 2 Level 2 Business Analysts

Bidders must submit a bid for all resource categories.

The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource, and unless otherwise directed, the contractor is expected to perform the work. Centralized SRCL #06 applies.

The following resources are required:

* 1 Business Analyst Level 3
* 2 Business Analysts Level 2

Deliverables include assistance with business analysis requirements and process redesign for internal and external processes.

For more details, please refer to the [Notice of Proposal] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/c18d00c79a835c24e2bab1958244a35e/2023-00212_npp.pdf) and [Appendix] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/818b77f181d1773b1d7bd0e197d6aee3/2023-00212_apm.pdf).

Contact Information:
Ronald Staigh
ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca
1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9

Only Indigenous suppliers who meet the definition of an Indigenous business, as defined in the PSIB, may participate in this procurement. Non-compliance will result in rejection of the bid.
